channel.title: Politics

item.title: Mayor Bass: Hispanic Border Patrol Agents 'Sad' Situation
item.description: Los Angeles Mayor Karen Bass said a report on the rising number of Hispanics joining the Border Patrol made her sad.

item.title: Tiny Pacific nation to take up to 75 deportees as Trump administration accelerates mass removals
item.description: Palau, a small Pacific nation with 18,000 residents, agreed to accept U.S. deportees to address labor shortages. The deal includes millions in aid.

item.title: Misspelled learning center, no children inside: Emmer presses Walz over Minnesota daycare tied to $4M
item.description: A YouTuber confronted a Minnesota daycare that can't spell "learning" but reportedly got $4 million in taxpayer funds amid a growing fraud scandal.

item.title: Kash Patel announces permanent closure of J. Edgar Hoover FBI Building for Reagan building move
item.description: FBI Director Kash Patel announces closure of Hoover building, saving billions by relocating headquarters operations to the existing Reagan building.
